member.name: T:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption
member.summary: WinBox 弹窗配置类

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Index
member.summary: Set the initial z-index of the window to this value (will be increased automatically when unfocused/focused).

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Id
member.summary: Set a unique id to the window. Used to define custom styles in css, query elements by context or just to identify the corresponding window instance. If no ID was set it will automatically create one for you.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Root
member.summary: 获得/设置 弹窗容器根节点 默认 body

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Class
member.summary: Add one or more class names to the window (multiple class names as array or separated with whitespaces e.g. "class-a class-b"). Used to define custom styles in css, query elements by context (also within CSS) or just to tag the corresponding window instance.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Title
member.summary: The window title.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Background
member.summary: Set the background of the window (supports all CSS styles which are also supported by the style-attribute "background", e.g. colors, transparent colors, hsl, gradients, background images)

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Border
member.summary: Set the border width of the window (supports all the browsers css units).

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Icon
member.summary: Make the title bar icon visible and set the image source to this url.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Modal
member.summary: Shows the window as modal.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Max
member.summary: Automatically toggles the window into maximized state when created.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Min
member.summary: Automatically toggles the window into minimized state when created.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Hidden
member.summary: Automatically toggles the window into hidden state when created.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Width
member.summary: Set the initial width/height of the window (supports units "px" and "%").

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Height
member.summary: Set the initial width/height of the window (supports units "px" and "%").

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.MinHeight
member.summary: Set the minimal width/height of the window (supports units "px" and "%"). Should be at least the height of the window header title bar.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.MinWidth
member.summary: Set the minimal width/height of the window (supports units "px" and "%"). Should be at least the height of the window header title bar.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.MaxHeight
member.summary: Set the maximum width/height of the window (supports units "px" and "%").

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.MaxWidth
member.summary: Set the maximum width/height of the window (supports units "px" and "%").

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.AutoSize
member.summary: Automatically size the window to fit the window contents.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.X
member.summary: Set the initial position of the window (supports: "right" for x-axis, "bottom" for y-axis, "center" for both, units "px" and "%" for both).

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Y
member.summary: Set the initial position of the window (supports: "right" for x-axis, "bottom" for y-axis, "center" for both, units "px" and "%" for both).

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Top
member.summary: Set or limit the viewport of the window's available area (supports units "px" and "%"). Also used for custom splitscreen configurations.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Right
member.summary: Set or limit the viewport of the window's available area (supports units "px" and "%"). Also used for custom splitscreen configurations.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Bottom
member.summary: Set or limit the viewport of the window's available area (supports units "px" and "%"). Also used for custom splitscreen configurations.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Left
member.summary: Set or limit the viewport of the window's available area (supports units "px" and "%"). Also used for custom splitscreen configurations.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Url
member.summary: Open URL inside the window (loaded via iframe).

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Html
member.summary: Set the innerHTML of the window body.

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.Overflow
member.summary: Allow the window to move outside the viewport borders on left, right and bottom (default is "false").

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.ContentTemplate
member.summary: 获得/设置 子组件模板 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnCreateAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 创建弹窗回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnShowAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 弹窗可见回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnHideAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 隐藏弹窗回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnFocusAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 弹窗获得焦点回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnBlurAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 弹窗失去焦点回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnFullscreenAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 弹窗全屏回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnRestoreAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 恢复弹窗回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnMaximizeAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 最大化弹窗回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnMinimizeAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 最小化弹窗回调方法 默认 null

member.name: P:BootstrapBlazor.Components.WinBoxOption.OnCloseAsync
member.summary: 获得/设置 关闭弹窗回调方法 默认 null
